settings.title: “Best High-Tech Glider”
settings.text: Glider boasts stain-resistant fabric and made with non-toxic materials. But the coolest thing about it is its high-tech features.

settings.description: A premium-quality reclining nursery glider built with a thoughtful combination of design, function, and comfort.
Features a manual recliner and glide functionality, a wide and comfy seat and our signature spill-proof fabric. The perfect solution for anyone looking for a power-free nursery glider.

All the features of our original reclining nursery glider, plus swivel functionality, a power lumbar support, and a slightly larger seat. Our pièce de résistance, The Glider Plus has all the features you could ever need from your nursery chair.
Our design-forward glider that is built for compact spaces (without sacrificing quality).

settings.review_1_header: "This is most definitely the Rolls-Royce of nursery gliders. So comfortable, functional & beautiful! Can’t wait to rock my grandson in it! 💙"
settings.review_2_header: "Surpassed all expectations. Since it arrived, I have been living in this chair! Making feeding and bedtime that much more comfortable. Couldn't recommend it enough! The power lumbar and adjustable headrest are what sold me and have definitely come in handy. Also the chair has a beautiful design that can definitely move to our TV room in the future. 10 out 10!"
settings.review_3_header: "This rocker/recliner is fantastic! Had a hard time finding a chair that checked all the boxes until I found the Glider+: comfortable for me (5’4”) and my husband (6’2”), attractive/stylish, rocking, reclining, and lumbar support. Great for breastfeeding, soothing, and snuggling with our newborn."
